We can take apart $\green{7}$ to make $\pink3$ and $\blue4$.   
We can put together $\pink3$ and $\blue4$ to make $\green{7}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$7-3=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $3=7$
